原帖内容
Upon their arrival at this new, mystic land, Steve and his group of explorers Thought the land to be barren. Nothing was in sight, and everything seemed untouched.
Then, one man fell off the floating island and landed on a cloud, causing shock among all the others. They began exploring the cloud layer and were amazed to discover what has been called by some The Gates of Heaven.
The mysterious palace stands alone among the clouds, with no explanation, and no other proof of the lifeforms that made it. Theories started flying: perhaps it was sent up here as a sacrifice to the gods; maybe the builders left it here to confuse future visitors; it could be a trap designed to lure unsuspecting travellers in.
Still, the monolith stands, alone and untouched for thousands of years, promising riches and mystery to anyone who dares to enter.


I've finished the exterior, but I'm struggling a bit with the interior section. The throne looks more inherently evil than I wanted, and there's still a lot of empty space to fill.
When I finish, I might try uploading a video, or taking some screenshots with the Shaders on, but I thought I'd try showing it off without shaders to be different.
我的渣翻（这个故事实在太长了，我就简单的翻译下）
在他们抵达这个崭新的，神圣的土地，史蒂夫和他的探险家小组认为这里是荒芜的。
然后，一个人从浮岛上掉入云层中，导致所有人感到震惊。他们开始探索云层然后惊奇的发现一个被称作天堂的大门。
神秘的宫殿独自坐落在云端。任何事物都是没有解释，没有依据的。他们各抒己见：也许这里是献祭众神的地方；也许建造者们把他留下来以混淆未来的访问者；它可能是一个圈套，引诱不知情的访问者……
然而，巨石孤獨地矗立着，几千年来没有被人发现。
就把故事翻译了一遍。。。作者说的就不翻了（都是些讲制作时多么多么辛苦然后希望大家下载之类的话）




快捷回复



感谢LZ~搬运辛苦~复制代码
